subject: Suits and Litigation
Ponzi and Pyramid Schemes
lead_paragraph: The request to the G.A.O. was made last month by four members of Congress, who are concerned with the clawback lawsuits filed by the trustee, Irving H. Picard.
snippet: The request to the G.A.O. was made last month by four members of Congress, who are concerned with the clawback lawsuits filed by the trustee, Irving H. Picard.
